member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatchManager
member.summary: A manager class to handle memory patches.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Manager`1.ApplyAll
member.summary: Applies all the IMemoryOperations contained in this manager via their Apply() method.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Manager`1.RemoveAll
member.summary: Removes all the IMemoryOperations contained in this manager via their Remove() method.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Manager`1.DeleteAll
member.summary: Deletes all the IMemoryOperations contained in this manager.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Manager`1.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a specific IMemoryOperation contained in this manager, by name.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.Manager`1.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an IMemoryOperation by name.
member.param: The name given to the IMemoryOperation

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatchManager.Create(System.IntPtr,System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new at the specified address.
member.param: The address to begin the patch.
The bytes to be written as the patch.
The name of the patch.
member.returns: A patch object that exposes the required methods to apply and remove the patch.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatchManager.CreateAndApply(System.IntPtr,System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new at the specified address, and applies it.
member.param: The address to begin the patch.
The bytes to be written as the patch.
The name of the patch.
member.returns: A patch object that exposes the required methods to apply and remove the patch.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Internals.Patch
member.summary: Contains methods, and information for a memory patch.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Internals.IMemoryOperation
member.summary: Represents an operation in memory, be it a patch, detour, or anything else.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.IMemoryOperation.Remove
member.summary: Removes this IMemoryOperation from memory. (Reverts the bytes back to their originals.)

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.IMemoryOperation.Apply
member.summary: Applies this IMemoryOperation to memory. (Writes new bytes to memory)

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.IMemoryOperation.IsApplied
member.summary: Returns true if this IMemoryOperation is currently applied.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.IMemoryOperation.Name
member.summary: Returns the name for this IMemoryOperation.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Patch.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Patch.Remove
member.summary: Removes this Patch from memory. (Reverts the bytes back to their originals.)

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Patch.Apply
member.summary: Applies this Patch to memory. (Writes new bytes to memory)

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Patch.Finalize
member.summary: Allows an to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.Patch.IsApplied
member.summary: Returns true if this Patch is currently applied.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.Patch.Name
member.summary: Returns the name for this Patch.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Internals.DetourManager
member.summary: A manager class to handle function detours, and hooks.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.DetourManager.Create(System.Delegate,System.Delegate,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Detour.
member.param: The original function to detour. (This delegate should already be registered via Magic.RegisterDelegate)
The new function to be called. (This delegate should NOT be registered!)
The name of the detour.
member.returns: A object containing the required methods to apply, remove, and call the original function.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.DetourManager.CreateAndApply(System.Delegate,System.Delegate,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and applies new Detour.
member.param: The original function to detour. (This delegate should already be registered via Magic.RegisterDelegate)
The new function to be called. (This delegate should NOT be registered!)
The name of the detour.
member.returns: A object containing the required methods to apply, remove, and call the original function.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour
member.summary: Contains methods, and information for a detour, or hook.

member.name: F:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour._hookDelegate
member.summary: This var is not used within the detour itself. It is only here to keep a reference, to avoid the GC from collecting the delegate instance!

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour.Apply
member.summary: Applies this Detour to memory. (Writes new bytes to memory)

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour.Remove
member.summary: Removes this Detour from memory. (Reverts the bytes back to their originals.)

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour.CallOriginal(System.Object[])
member.summary: Calls the original function, and returns a return value.
member.param: The arguments to pass. If it is a 'void' argument list, you MUST pass 'null'.
member.returns: An object containing the original functions return value.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour.Finalize
member.summary: Allows an to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour.IsApplied
member.summary: Returns true if this Detour is currently applied.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.Detour.Name
member.summary: Returns the name for this Detour.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Native.PeHeaderParser
member.summary: A class to extract PE header information from modules or PE files.

member.name: F:WhiteMagic.Native.PeHeaderParser.ModulePtr
member.summary: The handle, or base address, to the current PE file.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Native.PeHeaderParser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the PeHeaderParser class, using the specified path to a PE file.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Native.PeHeaderParser.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the PeHeaderParser class, using the handle or base address, to the specified module.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Native.PeHeaderParser.DosHeader
member.summary: Retrieves the IMAGE_DOS_HEADER for this PE file.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Native.PeHeaderParser.NtHeader
member.summary: Retrieves the IMAGE_NT_HEADER for this PE file. (This includes and nested structs, etc)

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Native.PeHeaderParser.PeHeaderConstants
member.summary: Contains constants ripped from WinNT.h

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Native.Win32
member.summary: A simplistic Win32 API wrapper class.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Native.Win32.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatternManager
member.summary: Credits to Dominik, Patrick, Bobbysing, and whoever else I forgot, for most of the ripped code here!

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatternManager.LoadFile(System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Loads a pattern file.
member.param: The full path to the file to be loaded. (XML files only!)
The start address to begin scanning from.
The length of data to scan.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatternManager.LoadFile(System.String,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Loads an XML pattern file, and scans a specific module.
member.param: The full path to the file to be loaded. (XML files only!)
The base address, or handle, to a module to scan. (Length/start will be calculated automatically)

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatternManager.LoadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads an XML pattern file, and scans the entry assembly. (The first module in the modules list)
member.param: The full path to the file to be loaded. (XML files only!)

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Internals.PatternManager.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an address from the found patterns stash.
member.param: The name of the pattern, as per the XML file provided in the constructor of this class instance.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.MissingAttributeException
member.summary: An exception that is thrown when a struct, class, or delegate is missing proper attributes.

member.name: T:WhiteMagic.Magic
member.summary:
The main memory library class. Just instantiate this class, and everything else you need is contained within. Alternatively, you can use the Magic.Instance property, to grab a static instance of this class (singleton)
I highly suggest tracking your own instances for fairly obvious reasons.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.ReadBytes(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a specific number of bytes from memory.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.ReadBytes(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a specific number of bytes from memory.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.Read``1(System.IntPtr[])
member.summary: Reads a "T" from memory, using consecutive reading.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.Read``1(System.UInt32[])
member.summary: Reads a "T" from memory, using consecutive reading.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.ReadStruct``1(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Reads a struct from memory. The struct must be attributed properly!

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.WriteBytes(System.IntPtr,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes a set of bytes to memory.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.WriteBytes(System.UInt32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes a set of bytes to memory.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.Write``1(System.IntPtr,``0)
member.summary: Writes a generic datatype to memory. (Note; only base datatypes are supported [int,float,uint,byte,sbyte,double,etc])

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.Write``1(System.UInt32,``0)
member.summary: Writes a generic datatype to memory. (Note; only base datatypes are supported [int,float,uint,byte,sbyte,double,etc])

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.WriteStruct``1(System.IntPtr,``0)
member.summary: Writes a struct to memory.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.WriteStruct``1(System.UInt32,``0)
member.summary: Writes a struct to memory.

member.summary: Retrieves a function pointer, to an objects virtual function table.
member.param: The pointer to the object.
The nth function to retrieve.

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.RegisterDelegate``1(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Registers a function into a delegate. Note: The delegate must provide a proper function signature!

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.RegisterDelegate``1(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Registers a function into a delegate. Note: The delegate must provide a proper function signature!

member.summary: Win32 LoadLibrary

member.summary: Win32 FreeLibrary

member.summary: Win32 GetProcAddress

member.name: M:WhiteMagic.Magic.GetProcAddress(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a library, and gets a procedure address.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Magic.Instance
member.summary: Retrieves a static instance of the class. (A singleton)

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Magic.Detours
member.summary: Provides access to the DetourManager class, that allows you to create and remove detours and hooks for functions. (Or any other use you may find...)

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Magic.Patches
member.summary: Provides access to the PatchManager class, which allows you to apply and remove patches.

member.name: P:WhiteMagic.Magic.Patterns
member.summary: Provides access to the PatternsManager class, which allows you to load, and search for patterns in memory.
